ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We acknowledge the E-OBS dataset from the EU-FP6 project ENSEMBLES ( http://ensembles-eu.metoffice.com) and the data providers in the ECA&D project ( http://www.ecad.eu). EM and HRV were funded by the European FP7 GLOWORM project (Grant agreement NÂ° 288975CP-TP-KBBE.2011.1.3-04) and the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC), UK, LoLa Consortium, BUG: Building Upon the Genome (Project reference: BB/M003949/1). The authors would also like to thank Dr Swaid Abdullah Wani for technical support with faecal egg counting, the Livestock Helminth Research Alliance ( www.lihra.eu) for their support, and three anonymous reviewers for their time and advice.
